General.Name: Northern Star Resources Limited
General.Description: Northern Star Resources Limited engages in the exploration, development, mining, processing, and sale of gold deposits in Australia. The company holds interests in the Pogo, Jundee, and Kalgoorlie operations, as well as Paulsens and Tanami projects. It has operations primarily in Western Australia, the Northern Territory, and Alaska. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Subiaco, Australia.

3.Name: Mr. Michael Geoffrey Mulroney MBA, MAusIMM
